name: Modal Popup Box – Popup Builder, Show Offers And News in Popup
author: A WP Life

sections.description:
Modal Popup Box – Popup Builder

Modal Popup Box is enable the functionality to add pop content on your WordPress website. You can add and show any type of content into modal pop up box. You can customize the popup box title, height and width, color, loading effect using plugin setting panel. You can enable popup functionality on button click or page load.

You can embed and display anything in popup box like image, YouTube videos, Vimeo videos, image gallery, album gallery, photo album, slider slideshows, various plugin shortcodes, tables, pricing tables, social media feeds, Facebook like box, Twitter tweets, Flickr feeds, Contact Form 7, buttons, HTML contents, greeting messages and images, coupon codes, discount codes, free and promotional offers, social media icons, customer feedback, clients testimonials, general forms, registrations forms.

How To Use Free Modal Popup Plugin?

Links

  • Free Plugin Live Demo
  • Premium Plugin Live Demo
  • Upgrade To Modal Popup Box Premium

Premium Version Features

  • Animation Effects
  • Responsive Design
  • Onload or On Click Modal Pop Up Functionality
  • Height & Width Settings
  • Heading Text Alignment
  • Button Text Alignment
  • 20+ Effects
  • Embed portfolio into modal popup box
  • Embed iFrame into popup box
  • Insert video into popup box
  • Insert GoogleMap into modal pop up box
  • Button Link Settings
  • On Page Load Popup
  • Shortcode
  • Color Picker
  • Font Color
  • Button Settings
  • Button Loading Effects
  • Overlay settings
  • Custom CSS
  • Modal Popup Loading Effects
  • Paste gallery shortcode into pop up box
sections.installation:
Install Modal Pop Box builder either via the WordPress.org plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server.

After activating Modal Pop Box maker, go to plugin menu.

Click Add Modal Pop Box and write the content in the text box.

Publish the modal pop box builder and copy shortcode from the bottom of the add images box and embed shortcode on any Page/Post/Text Widget.

That’s it. You’re ready to go!

sections.reviews:
Really dislike the recommendations

By jirvin (jrvin) on December 19, 2022

Plugin works okay. Really dislike the additional plugin recommendations that looked more like the kind of recommendations/mandatory plugin requirements that themes use. Also really disliked that it was titled "Extra recommends..." - Extra? What's Extra? It has nothing to do with the name of this plugin or the developer. I had a moment of panic thinking someone logged in and installed a new theme called Extra. Took deactivating/reactivating plugins one-by-one to track down where the messages was coming from. Very annoying.

Somewhat Simple and useful but not for developers.. No Hooks

By stormhill on February 15, 2022

add some actions and filters in key places in the code and it will be very useful.

Super Limited Functionality + Lackluster Support

By tjgottfried on July 22, 2021

I upgraded to premium with the impression it was going to allow me to configure the button with some additional options, but even with that, it's extremely limited in terms of any customization or utility. Additionally, support was futile once I started asking questions regarding its functionality. I also requested a refund but to no prevail (actually no answer). I wasn't even inclined to leave a review until they went ghost. There's other modals that offer a lot more functionality even on the basic level.

Sry :)

By sden on May 22, 2021

I dont used this plugin) I was wrong :)

top ↑

By wordpress Spec (powerflash) on September 25, 2020

very good plugin

Easy To Use

By agusapri on August 21, 2020

Easy to use. I agree with what other say need work more on UI. But this for now is all I need, works smooth, responsive window. Thank you very much, guys.

Good Plugin but UI needs work

By ngmp on August 8, 2018

The plugin works well and does the job it sets out to do. However creating the pop-up via the creation page needs improving. Very ugly and full of links to other products which makes you miss things. So took a star off for that. Biggest omission imo is the fact you don't seem to be able to alter the modal close text which has the puerile "Close me" rather than a simple "close". Another star dropped for laziness. Otherwise it is very good.

Cool animations

By amandavelso on January 26, 2018

This plugin have cool animations. I like them.

Nice popup

By jonson1anne on November 21, 2017

This popup support all plugin's shortcode. It's working perfectly.

Problems sending attachments

By roberto.arrucha on November 14, 2017

On the version 4.8.1 I couldn´t receive emails with the attachments. I just updated and still cannot receive attachments by email. Hope u can fix the problem.
